MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 08-JAN-2021 13:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the L18 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Mather Avenue and the surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:30 pm to progress repairs to a fault on the underground cable network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 1:30 pm. We will update this message if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:17 am on 8th January, 2021.
